QuestData.Title: Resupplying Supplies
QuestData.Description:
The Nokhud have been striking at outsiders crossing into the plains. This is no doubt their handiwork.
This survivor says that most of their food supplies were destroyed in the ambush. We should try to help out.
Let's collect meat from the plentiful game around the Watering Hole. That should be enough to cover their immediate needs.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Fresh Plains Meat from the area surrounding Toghusuq Village.
